book.synopsis: In The Gonzo Way, Anita Thompson pays tribute to her late husband as a writer and as a citizen, through her own words and through interviews with those who knew him best, including Tom Wolfe, George McGovern, and Douglas Brinkley.
book.title_long: The Gonzo Way: A Celebration of Dr. Hunter S. Thompson
